message: Hello Bob, I am offering you my product for $115. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I need to maintain my minimum price to ensure profitability. I am proposing a final offer of $110 for the product. I hope this meets within our acceptable range.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can adjust my offer. How about $105 for the product? I believe this brings us closer together while still being within my budget.
